title: Extend checkstyle-examples-checks
description:
As we progress in xdocs generation project, we are discovering more check modules that need to be added. We can use this issue to track them. Please comment here and I will update list as needed until we send a PR.

  • enforce newline at end of file
  • forbidden regexp in violation messages
  • check for compilation comments in non-compilable resource folder
  • discourage usage of regexp escaping in violation messages ( we should use java examples code without such symbols)
  • Add CommentsIndentation check
  • check for presence of xdoc delimiter comments (// xdoc section -- start)
